column5: Best Wishes for a Happy and Safe Christmas
Merry Christmas back to you   Art
Merry Christmas to you and welcome aboard.
Wishing the best of the holiday season from all of us to all of you.  Merry Christmas and happy new year.  Jim
Merry Christmas to you too.. Welcome to the forurm!
Hyyvaa Joulua, and a Merry Christmas to you too.
Merry Christmas to you also and welcome to the board.. pull up a chair and stay awhile.. I did and never looked back with all the friends I have made & met
Merry Christmas to you right back
Thank you all for the warm welcome and wishes.  Btw: the pictures of Yorck & Renate ain't that great but here is a picture of Mensch
Pocket book puppies or is that your muskie tackle bag? lol    Art
Art  I have never caught a muskie, 49" northern pike was the biggest but still quiet  a thrill.  my niece was trying to steal the little fellow, hence the purse.
Well done I am still at 38inch Pike but I have a 60lb Blue Catfish under my belt.lol   Art
As a kid we used to go bow fishing for Carp, Grand River near WW airport and got a lot of big ones.  Is that still legal - or was it ever. :
